#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod		1000000007
#define LL		long long int
#define s(n)		scanf("%lld",&n);
#define sc(c)		scanf("%c",&c);
#define ss(s)		scanf("%s",s);
#define loop(x,a,b)	for(x=a;x<b;x++)
#define rep(i,n)	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define mp		make_pair
#define pb		push_back
#define	vi		vector<LL>
#define pll             pair<LL,LL>
#define vp		vector<PLL>
#define vs		vector<string>
#define vvi		vector<VI>
#define vvs	vector<VS>
#define F first
#define S second
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    for(int cs=1; cs<=t; cs++){
        int x,y;
        cin >> x >> y;

        int len=0,tmp;
        tmp=y;
        while(tmp)
            len++,tmp/=10;

        int i;
        for(i=1; ; i++){
            long double p=i*log10(x);
            if((int)(powl(10.0L,p-floor(p)+len-1))==y)break;
        }
        cout << "Case " << cs << ": " << i<< endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
